column6:
The Overthinker sings The Ballad of The Bearded Superhero, while the Fonziebot takes a short walk off a tall skyscraper, and Alex meets the real Nowhere Man and battles his robotics professor on the Columbia University quad -- all this and more, as the story of Jonathan Lethem and Farel Dalrymple's OMEGA THE UNKNOWN saga approaches its mad climax!,2008,5
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Farel Dalrymple | colorist:Paul Hornschemeier | writer:Jonathan Lethem | writer:Karl Rusnak
